p: Natural antioxidants play an important role in providing stability to vegetable oils hampering their oxidation. Antioxidant activity should not be concluded based on a single antioxidant test model, therefore, antioxidant activity of VOB was evaluated using four different chemical assays and the results are presented in Table 2. VOB exhibited only slight antioxidant activity (IC 50 233.7±1.48 µg/mL) estimated by its ability to reduce ferric iron (Fe 3+) to ferrous iron (Fe 2+) compared to tocopherol (IC 50 9.68± 2.30 µg/mL). VOB did not exhibit any scavenging activity of DPPH, ABTS, and NO radical ( Table 2) up to 2000 µg/mL.
